hero.homeTitle: Your place for gaming and online relaxation!

about.title: Description
about.desc1: A modern internet café where you can both work and play. We offer high-speed internet, comfortable work and playstations, and a wide selection of games.
about.desc2: Sweet Bonanza was created for those who love online games and are looking for the perfect place to play and relax. We are here to provide our clients with the best conditions for work and entertainment.

amenities.text: Sweet Bonanza is a modern internet café that combines a unique atmosphere for work, gaming, and relaxation. Our goal is to provide a place where you can spend time enjoying your favorite online games or focus on work in a comfortable and professional environment.

promotion.mainText: At Sweet Bonanza, we always have something special for our customers! Take advantage of our promotions and special offers to enjoy even more comfort and fun.
promotion.cardDesc1: Bring your friends! Get a 10% discount on all stations for groups of 4 or more.
promotion.cardDesc2: Become our regular customer and enjoy a 15% discount on every next visit.
promotion.cardDesc3: Play without limits throughout the entire weekend for only 300 PLN! The perfect option for gamers who can’t get enough of their favorite games.
promotion.cardDesc4: On your first visit to our internet café, get your first hour of gameplay for free. It's the perfect opportunity to test our stations and feel the Sweet Bonanza atmosphere!

aboutPage.cardDesc1: **Sweet Bonanza** is a modern internet café, created for those who value comfort both during gaming and work. Our goal is to create a space where everyone can find their place – whether you're a gamer or a professional. We offer a wide selection of online games, comfortable stations, and a friendly atmosphere that encourages both concentration and relaxation.
aboutPage.cardDesc2: Our café is equipped with the latest computer hardware and high-speed internet, ensuring smooth gaming and efficient work. Comfortable, ergonomic stations and separate zones for gamers and workers provide top-level comfort. We also offer air conditioning and access to games on platforms like Steam, Epic Games, and more.
aboutPage.cardDesc3: Our mission is to create a space where everyone feels at home, whether they come to play or work. We believe everyone deserves excellent service and exceptional conditions for productivity. That’s why we care for our clients by providing not only modern infrastructure but also a welcoming atmosphere.
aboutPage.item1: Fast and stable internet for gamers and workers
aboutPage.item2: Modern computer stations for gaming and work
aboutPage.item3: Wide selection of games on popular platforms
aboutPage.item4: Relaxation zone with coffee and snacks
aboutPage.item5: Option to rent stations by the hour or long-term
aboutPage.cardDesc5: We stand out with a professional approach to every client. Our team is always ready to assist and advise. Whether you're here to play or work, we offer a space that supports your needs. Our commitment to quality service makes Sweet Bonanza more than just an internet café – it's a place where technology meets comfort.

servicesPage.cardDesc1: We offer broadband, fast, and stable internet, ideal for both intensive work and online gaming. Thanks to our network, clients can enjoy smooth connections without delays.
servicesPage.cardDesc2: Our gaming stations are equipped with the latest high-performance computers, ideal for e-sports players and online game enthusiasts. We offer games on popular platforms like Steam, Epic Games, and more.
servicesPage.cardDesc3: For those who need a place to work, we provide comfortable desks, ergonomic spaces, and a quiet environment that fosters concentration. Our stations are equipped with 4K monitors and comfortable chairs, ensuring excellent conditions for remote work.
servicesPage.cardDesc4: In our café, you can enjoy delicious coffee and light snacks to make your time more enjoyable during gaming or work. We offer a wide selection of beverages and healthy snacks that are perfect for a quick break!
servicesPage.cardDesc5: We offer the option to rent our computer stations by the hour or long-term. Whether you're here for an hour or planning a longer session, we have flexible packages to meet your needs.
servicesPage.cardDesc6: For the most demanding clients, we offer premium packages that include access to the latest VR technologies, more privacy, and additional services such as station reservations and dedicated technical support.

pricePage.cardDesc4: Take advantage of our promotions and discounts:
pricePage.item9: First hour of gameplay free on your first visit
pricePage.item10: 10% discount for groups of 4 or more people
pricePage.item11: 15% discount for regular customers on each subsequent visit

payment.text1: At our online store https://sweet-bonanzaonlinecafe.com, we offer various convenient payment methods to ensure comfortable shopping for our customers. You can choose one of the following payment methods:
payment.text2: All payments are processed securely, ensuring the protection of your personal and financial data.
payment.text3: We deliver our products within Poland and to many European countries. We offer the following delivery options:
payment.text4: Delivery costs are calculated automatically during the order process and depend on the selected delivery method and location.
payment.text5: After dispatching your order, you will receive a tracking number that allows you to monitor the delivery status in real-time.
payment.text6: For any questions regarding payment or delivery, please contact us via the Contact page available on https://sweet-bonanzaonlinecafe.com. We are here to help!
payment.item3: Online Payment via secure payment systems
payment.item4: Cash on delivery (available for selected delivery methods)
payment.item7: International Delivery (5-10 business days, depending on the country)

rules.title3: 3. Terms of Use of the Platform
rules.text1: These terms of use set out the rules for using the platform https://sweet-bonanzaonlinecafe.com. Using our website means accepting these terms. Please read the terms carefully before making any purchases.
rules.text2: When placing an order, the user is required to provide accurate data such as name, phone number, and email address. This information is necessary for order processing and customer contact. https://sweet-bonanzaonlinecafe.com guarantees the protection of personal data in accordance with applicable data protection regulations.
rules.text3: The user agrees to use the platform in accordance with the law and the rules set out in these terms. The following is prohibited:
rules.text4: The platform https://sweet-bonanzaonlinecafe.com is not liable for any damages resulting from improper use of its services by the user. In case of technical problems with the platform, the user must report them to the site administrators immediately.
rules.text5: We reserve the right to make changes to these terms at any time. All changes will be posted on this page and will take effect upon publication. Continuing to use the platform after changes are made means accepting the new terms.
rules.text6: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us via the Contact page available on https://sweet-bonanzaonlinecafe.com.
rules.item1: Using the platform in a manner that violates applicable laws.
rules.item2: Providing false or misleading information during registration or order placement.
rules.item3: Using the platform for activities that harm its operation.

warranty.text1: All products purchased from the online store https://sweet-bonanzaonlinecafe.com are covered by the manufacturer’s warranty. The warranty covers manufacturing defects and damage resulting from normal use. The warranty period depends on the specific product and is indicated in its description on our site.
warranty.text2: If you find a defect in a purchased product, please contact our customer service department immediately via the Contact page available on our website.
warranty.text3: Customers have the right to return purchased goods within 14 days of receiving the package without giving a reason. To exercise the right of withdrawal, please contact our customer service department and complete the return form available on our website.
warranty.text4: Returned products must be in their original condition, in the original packaging, and without signs of use. The return shipping costs are covered by the customer unless the return is due to an error on our part (e.g., sending the wrong product).
warranty.text5: Once we receive and inspect the returned product, a refund will be issued to the customer’s account within 14 business days. Refunds will be made using the same payment method used by the customer during purchase unless otherwise agreed.
warranty.text6: If you wish to exchange a product for another, please contact our customer service department. Product exchanges are possible, provided the requested product is in stock. In this case, you need to return the purchased item, and we will send the new one after receiving the returned product.
warranty.text7: For any questions regarding warranty or returns, please contact our customer service department via the Contact page available on our website. We are happy to answer any questions and help resolve any issues.

privacy.text1: This privacy policy sets out the rules for processing personal data of users using the website https://sweet-bonanzaonlinecafe.com. Protecting our customers' privacy is our priority, which is why we collect and process personal data in accordance with applicable laws, including the European Parliament and Council Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR).
privacy.text2: When placing an order or registering on our website, we may ask for the following data:
privacy.text3: This data is necessary to process orders and contact customers in case of any questions or issues.
privacy.text4: We process users' personal data for the following purposes:
privacy.text5: All personal data is protected using appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure its security against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. Only authorized persons, who are required to maintain confidentiality, have access to the data.
privacy.text6: Every user has the right to:
privacy.text7: Our website uses cookies to improve the quality of services provided and to customize content to individual user preferences. Users can manage cookie settings through their web browser. Detailed information is available in our Cookie Policy.
privacy.text8: We reserve the right to make changes to this privacy policy. Any changes will be published on this page. We recommend regularly reviewing the policy to stay informed about the current rules regarding data protection.
privacy.text9: For any questions regarding the privacy policy, please contact us via the Contact page.
privacy.item7: Providing information about news, promotions, and special offers, if the user has agreed to receive the newsletter
privacy.item8: Improving site functionality and analyzing site traffic
privacy.item10: Correcting, deleting, or restricting the processing of data
privacy.item11: Withdrawing consent for data processing at any time
privacy.item12: Transferring data to another data controller
privacy.item13: Filing a complaint with a supervisory authority in case of a breach of data protection laws
